title: Maretti's Deli, Manitowoc - Menu, Reviews (186), Photos (59) - Restaurantji
text: Maretti's Deli $ â¢ Sandwich Shops, Italian, Pet Friendly Hours: 823 Buffalo St, Manitowoc (920) 684-9151 About Maretti's Deli Maretti's Deli is a charming Italian restaurant that offers authentic flavors and warm hospitality. The interior is inviting with rustic decor and cozy seating, perfect for savoring their exceptional food. From classic sub sandwiches, like Genoa Salami and Italian, to homemade pasta dishes, each bite is a symphony of flavors that leaves diners craving more. The menu features delicious options, including tortellini salad and tomato basil soup, making it hard to choose just one favorite. Prices range from $10 to $20 per person, ensuring a worthwhile investment for a truly unforgettable culinary experience. Whether stopping in for a quick bite or a leisurely lunch, Maretti's is the perfect destination for anyone seeking an authentic taste of Italy. The staff is professional, and service is quick, contributing to the friendly atmosphere. Don't miss out on this gem of a find with its charming ambiance, exceptional food, and reasonable prices. Customers' Favorites Maretti's Deli Reviews excellent food and very friendly staff excellent food and very friendly staff Love their BLT sandwiches on deli bread and delicious tomato mozzarella salad!
